description: This file defines an interface named ClientConfigCustomizer in Java, which provides a method to customize configuration directories and a static method to copy configuration files from classpath resources to a specified storage namespace directory.

classes.name: ClientConfigCustomizer
classes.description: A Java interface for customizing client configuration, with a constant logger, an abstract method to customize configuration, and a static method to copy configuration files from classpath resources to a storage namespace directory.

methods.name: customizeConfig
methods.description: Abstract method that implementations must define to customize the configuration directory.

methods.name: copyConfigToStorageNamespace
methods.description: Static method that copies resources matching a classpath pattern into a specific storage namespace directory under 'etc/storage', creating necessary directories, and logging the copying process.
